DOC.detailed_description: The present study design confirm therapeutic effect heat-clearing blood-activating Chinese medicinal component treatment Acute Cerebral Infarction ( ACI ) investigate therapeutic mechanism multi-target anti-inflammatory action involve standpoint pathology , cell molecular biology , well immunology . In particular , investigator choose heat-clearing Ixeris sonchifolia Hance ( Kudiezi Injection ) blood-activating Panax notoginseng saponin ( Xueshuantong Injection ) therapeutic intervention carry investigation , apply key technique Lentivirus-mediated RNA interference , co-immunoprecipitation immunomagnetic bead . With joint effort , investigator hope find combined therapeutic target base well understanding inflammatory pathology ACI illuminate synergistic mechanism involve , may validate Chinese medicine theory '' cerebral vascular damage due heat toxicity '' pathogenesis ACI yield new therapeutic strategy ACI . As international science technology cooperation project , study great significance establish international technology platform intervention target system treatment ACI ; moreover , mark key step forward China enhance China 's international brand explore successful mode foreign cooperation Chinese medicine .
